title: What are some examples of repetition in writing? - Quora

response.answer_text: Bruce R. Bain's answer to What is the difference between "identify," "discern" and "discriminate?" See Bruce R. Bain’s answer to: https://www.quora.com/What-are-some-examples-of-sentences-using-the-word-articulate I major in English, I' afraid my English will fall behind if I choose a job that is not related to English. What should I do to keep my English?
One example of repetition of a single word is used in real estate to stress the importance of a property’s proximity to all things desirable: location, location, location.
